alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:03PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wakulla, Gadsden, central Liberty and Leon Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 402 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chattahoochee to 15 miles east of Stonemill Creek. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Quincy, Havana, Midway, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Greensboro, Gretna, Sopchoppy, Lake Bradford, Jewel Fire Tower, Wakulla Springs, Vilas, Florence, South City and Medart. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
